					<h3>KEY DATES</h3>
					

<div class="custom"  style="background-image: url('/images/sampledata/dates.jpg')" >
	<ul>
<li><span style="color: #7f7f7f; line-height: 150%; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 7pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: CourierNewPSMT; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: IT; mso-themecolor: text1; mso-themetint: 128;" lang="EN-US"><strong>Conference</strong><br />• <span style="text-decoration: line-through;">Paper abstracts due: Jul. 31, 2012</span><br />• <span style="text-decoration: line-through;">Papers due: Aug. 7, 2012</span><br />• <span style="text-decoration: line-through;">Paper notifications: Oct. 26, 2012</span><br />• <span style="text-decoration: line-through;">Camera ready deadline: Nov. 30, 2012</span><br />• Conference: Feb. 6-8, 2013</span></li>
<li><span style="color: #7f7f7f; line-height: 150%; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 7pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: CourierNewPSMT; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: IT; mso-themecolor: text1; mso-themetint: 128;" lang="EN-US"><strong>Workshops</strong><br />• <span style="text-decoration: line-through;">Workshop proposals due: Jun. 29, 2012</span><br />• <span style="text-decoration: line-through;">Workshop notifications: Aug. 3, 2012</span><br />• <span style="text-decoration: line-through;">Paper notifications: Nov. 30, 2012</span><br />• Workshops: Feb. 4-5, 2013</span></li>
<li><span style="color: #7f7f7f; line-height: 150%; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 7pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: CourierNewPSMT; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: IT; mso-themecolor: text1; mso-themetint: 128;" lang="EN-US"><strong>Tutorials</strong><br />• <span style="text-decoration: line-through;">Tutorial proposals due: Aug. 31, 2012</span><br />• <span style="text-decoration: line-through;">Tutorial notifications: Oct. 12, 2012</span><br />• <span style="text-decoration: line-through;">Tutorial camera ready: Nov. 2, 2012</span><br />• Tutorial: Feb. 4-5, 2013</span></li>
<li><span style="color: #7f7f7f; line-height: 150%; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 7pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: CourierNewPSMT; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: IT; mso-themecolor: text1; mso-themetint: 128;" lang="EN-US"><strong>Data Challenge</strong><br />• <span style="text-decoration: line-through;">Launch Data Challenge: Aug. 31, 2012</span><br /></span><span style="text-decoration: line-through;"><span style="color: #7f7f7f; line-height: 150%; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 7pt; text-decoration: line-through;" lang="EN-US">• </span></span><span style="color: #7f7f7f; line-height: 150%; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 7pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: CourierNewPSMT; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: IT; mso-themecolor: text1; mso-themetint: 128;" lang="EN-US"><span style="text-decoration: line-through;">Registration to participate: Sep. 30, 2012</span><br />• <span style="text-decoration: line-through;">End Data Challenge: Dec. 14, 2012</span><br />• Data Challenge presentations: Feb. 5, 2013</span></li>
<li><span style="color: #7f7f7f; line-height: 150%; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 7pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: CourierNewPSMT; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: IT; mso-themecolor: text1; mso-themetint: 128;" lang="EN-US"><strong>Doctoral Consortium</strong><br />• <span style="text-decoration: line-through;">Submission: Sep. 14, 2012</span> <span style="text-decoration: line-through;"><span style="color: red; line-height: 150%; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 7pt; text-decoration: line-through;" lang="EN-US">Sep. 21, 2012</span></span></span><br /><span style="color: #7f7f7f; line-height: 150%; font-family: 'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size: 7pt; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-font-family: CourierNewPSMT; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: IT; mso-themecolor: text1; mso-themetint: 128;" lang="EN-US">• <span style="text-decoration: line-through;">Notifications: Nov. 20, 2012</span><br />• <span style="text-decoration: line-through;">Camera ready deadline: Nov. 30, 2012</span><br />• Doctoral Consortium: Feb. 5, 2013</span></li>

 var pns = jQuery.noConflict();
     pns(window).load(function() {

        pns('#slider89').nivoSlider({
		effect: 'random', // Specify sets like: 'fold,fade,sliceDown'
        slices: 15, // For slice animations
        boxCols: 8, // For box animations
        boxRows: 4, // For box animations
        animSpeed: 600, // Slide transition speed
        pauseTime: 8000, // How long each slide will show
        startSlide: 0, // Set starting Slide (0 index)
        directionNav: false, // Next & Prev navigation
        directionNavHide: false, // Only show on hover
        controlNav: true, // 1,2,3... navigation
        controlNavThumbs: false, // Use thumbnails for Control Nav
        controlNavThumbsFromRel: false, // Use image rel for thumbs
        controlNavThumbsSearch: '.jpg', // Replace this with...
        controlNavThumbsReplace: '_thumb.jpg', // ...this in thumb Image src
        keyboardNav: true, // Use left & right arrows
        pauseOnHover: true, // Stop animation while hovering
        manualAdvance: false, // Force manual transitions
        captionOpacity: 0.8, // Universal caption opacity
        prevText: 'Prev', // Prev directionNav text
        nextText: 'Next', // Next directionNav text
        beforeChange: function(){}, // Triggers before a slide transition
        afterChange: function(){}, // Triggers after a slide transition
        slideshowEnd: function(){}, // Triggers after all slides have been shown
        lastSlide: function(){}, // Triggers when last slide is shown
        afterLoad: function(){} // Triggers when slider has loaded
		});

    });

    </script>

    <div class="blog-featured">

<div class="items-leading">
			<div class="leading-0">
			
	<h2>
					<a href="/index.php/81-home/24-wsdm-2013">
			WSDM 2013</a>
			</h2>






<p style="text-align: justify;">WSDM (pronounced "wisdom") is one of the premier conferences covering research in the areas of search and data mining on the Web.  The Sixth ACM WSDM Conference will take place in Rome, Italy during  February 6-8, 2013. February 4 and 5 will be dedicated to tutorials, workshops and data challenge; whereas February 5 will be dedicated to the Doctoral Consortium.</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">WSDM publishes original, high quality papers and presentations related to search and data mining on the Web and the Social Web, with an emphasis on practical but principled novel models of search, retrieval and data mining, algorithm design and analysis, economic implications, and in-depth experimental analysis of accuracy and performance.</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">WSDM 2013 is a highly selective, single track meeting that includes invited talks as well as refereed full papers.</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><a href="https://twitter.com/wsdm2013" target="_blank"><img src="/images/follow-us-on-twitter.jpg" border="0" alt="" width="196" height="27" /></a> </p>
<h3 style="text-align: justify;">News</h3>
<ul>
<li>
<div>Limited financial support for students in difficult financial conditions might still be available. Please send an inquiry to 
 <script type='text/javascript'>
 <!--
 var prefix = '&#109;a' + 'i&#108;' + '&#116;o';
 var path = 'hr' + 'ef' + '=';
 var addy90707 = 'ch&#105;&#101;r&#105;ch&#101;tt&#105;' + '&#64;';
 addy90707 = addy90707 + 'd&#105;' + '&#46;' + '&#117;n&#105;r&#111;m&#97;1' + '&#46;' + '&#105;t';
 document.write('<a ' + path + '\'' + prefix + ':' + addy90707 + '\'>');
 document.write(addy90707);
 document.write('<\/a>');
 //-->\n </script><script type='text/javascript'>
 <!--
 document.write('<span style=\'display: none;\'>');
 //-->
 </script>This e-mail address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.
 <script type='text/javascript'>
 <!--
 document.write('</');
 document.write('span>');
 //-->
 </script> by Friday February 1.</div>
</li>
<li>Check (but don't print it yet; more to come) some <a href="/index.php/attendees/travel-information">travel information and recommendations</a>.</li>
<li>New at this year's WSDM: <a href="http://unconventionalwsdm.org/" target="_blank">Unconventional WSDM</a></li>
<li>Check the <a href="/index.php/program/best-papers">best-paper awards</a>!</li>
<li>The list of <a href="/index.php/program/accepted-papers">accepted papers</a> is available.</li>
<li><a href="/index.php/attendees/registration">Registration</a> is now open. You can also find <a href="/index.php/attendees/hotel-information">information</a> about hotels.</li>
<li>The list of accepted <a href="/index.php/program/tutorials">tutorials</a> is available.</li>
<li>The list of accepted <a href="/index.php/program/workshops">workshops</a> is available.</li>
<li>The submission deadline for the <a href="/index.php/authors/doctoral-consortium">doctoral consortium</a> has been extended to September 21.</li>
<li>August 31, 2012: The <a href="/contents/challenge.pdf">call</a> of the <a href="/index.php/authors/data-challenge">data challenge</a> has been published.</li>
<li style="list-style: none;">Notice the <strong>deadlines</strong>: Registration to participate: September 30, Final submission: December 14.</li>
<li>August 2, 2012: A <a href="/contents/challenge-draft.pdf">draft</a> of the <a href="/index.php/authors/data-challenge">data challenge</a> is available.</li>
<li>July 28, 2012: Remember the <strong>deadlines</strong>:<strong></strong> Abstract submission: July 31, full paper submission: August 7, 11.59pm, anywhere in the world (<a href="http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/city.html?n=724" target="_blank">Alofi time</a>).</li>
</ul>
